summary.span: Contains all the localizable resources in a BAML record.

span.span: Contains all the localizable resources in a BAML record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典包含資源索引鍵的對應 (指定為物件) 資源的值 (指定為物件)。The dictionary contains a mapping from resource keys (specified as objects) to resource values (specified as objects). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 。The following example demonstrates how to use a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定整個網頁的某些屬性，藉由新增或修改其根項目，因為相依性屬性的屬性繼承的效果的內容。You can set some properties for the entire page by adding or modifying the properties of its root element, due to the effects of property inheritance for dependency properties. 例如，變更根項目的屬性頁面上設定該屬性的每個項目。For example, changing the root element's property sets that property for every element on the page.
